label: All the leaves are...
input:
<input type='radio' id='brown' name='leavesColor' value='brown'>
<label for='brown'>Brown</label>
<input type='radio' id='yellow' name='leavesColor' value='yellow'>
<label for='yellow'>Yellow</label>
<input type='radio' id='red' name='leavesColor' value='red'>
<label for='red'>Red</label>

label: the sky is...
input: <textarea id='theSky' name='theSky' rows='1' placeholder='(rhymes with L.A.)'></textarea>

label: What I have been doing today:
input:
<select id='doingToday' name='doingToday'>
<option value='a walk'>Been for a walk</option>
<option value='a wash'>Washing the car</option>
<option value='a barbecue'>Barbecueing with the family</option>
<option value='a jump'>Jumping from a Jefferson's Airplane</option>
</select>

label: How would you be if you were in L.A.?
input:
<input type='checkbox' id='safe' name='safe' value='safe'>
<label for='safe'>Safe</label>
<input type='checkbox' id='high' name='high' value='high'>
<label for='high'>High</label>
<input type='checkbox' id='warm' name='warm' value='warm'>
<label for='warm'>Warm</label>
<input type='checkbox' id='broke' name='broke' value='broke'>
<label for='broke'>Broke</label>

label: You see a church...
What does the preacher like?
input:
<input type='radio' id='cold' name='preachersPreference' value='cold'>
<label for='cold'>The Cold</label>
<input type='radio' id='old' name='preachersPreference' value='old'>
<label for='old'>The Old</label>
<input type='radio' id='bold' name='preachersPreference' value='bold'>
<label for='bold'>The bold</label>
<input type='radio' id='bald' name='preachersPreference' value='bald'>
<label for='bald'>The bald</label>

label: The preacher knows I'm gonna...
input: <textarea id='thePreacherKnows' name='thePreacherKnows' rows='1' placeholder='(not go anywhere)'></textarea>

label: I'm gonna stay
dreaming about where?
input: <textarea id='california' name='california' rows='1' placeholder='(a bear in a flag?!)'></textarea>

label: What season is it?
input:
<input type='radio' id='winter' name='season' value='winter'>
<label for='winter'>Winter</label>
<input type='radio' id='summer' name='season' value='summer'>
<label for='summer'>Summer</label>
<input type='radio' id='fall' name='season' value='fall'>
<label for='fall'>Fall</label>
<input type='radio' id='spring' name='season' value='spring'>
<label for='spring'>Spring</label>
